summary: "Hannibal" is a 2001 thriller movie directed by Ridley Scott. It's a sequel to "The Silence of the Lambs" and stars Anthony Hopkins as the cannibalistic killer, Hannibal Lecter. FBI agent Clarice Starling, now played by Julianne Moore, tries to catch Lecter before his enemy, Mason Verger, does. The film was very popular but got mixed reviews. It made lots of money worldwide. A prequel, "Red Dragon," came out the next year.
title: Hannibal (2001 film)
